entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:05 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 09:32 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure: 98.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
